faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products and services
faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search

q1.question: What quality grades do you offer?
q1.answer: We offer various quality grades including OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer), Genuine/Original parts, and aftermarket parts rated as Grade A (premium), Grade B (standard), and Grade C (economy). Each grade has different quality levels and price points to suit your needs.

q2.question: How can I verify part authenticity?
q2.answer: All our genuine parts come with manufacturer certificates and can be verified through the part number. We provide detailed documentation including factory addresses, manufacturing dates, and quality certificates. You can also contact us with your part number for verification.

q3.question: Do you sell both new and used parts?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer new, used, and refurbished parts. Each product listing clearly indicates its condition. New parts are unused and in original packaging, used parts are tested and functional, and refurbished parts have been professionally restored.

q4.question: What brands do you specialize in?
q4.answer: We specialize in genuine automotive parts. This includes all Chinese truck models (various truck models) and diesel engine series. Our expertise in these brands ensures you get the right parts with expert support.

q5.question: How do I find compatible parts for my vehicle?
q5.answer: You can search by part number, vehicle model, or browse by category. If you're unsure about compatibility, contact us with your VIN number or vehicle details, and our team will help identify the correct parts for your specific model and year.

q1.question: How do I place an order?
q1.answer: Browse our products and add items to your inquiry list. Contact us via the contact form, WhatsApp, or email with your requirements. We'll send you a detailed quotation including pricing, availability, and shipping costs. Once you approve, we'll process your order.

q2.question: Can I order parts in bulk?
q2.answer: Yes! We welcome bulk orders and offer competitive pricing for large quantities. Contact us with your requirements, and we'll provide special bulk pricing and arrange efficient shipping solutions for your order.

q3.question: Do you provide quotations?
q3.answer: Yes, all orders start with a detailed quotation. We provide transparent pricing including part costs, shipping, and any applicable fees. Quotations are typically provided within 24 hours of your inquiry.

q4.question: What is your minimum order quantity?
q4.answer: There is no strict minimum order quantity. However, for very small orders, shipping costs may be proportionally higher. We recommend ordering multiple parts together to optimize shipping costs.

q5.question: How long does it take to process an order?
q5.answer: In-stock items are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Custom or special-order items may take 3-7 days. We'll provide a clear timeline when you place your order and keep you updated throughout the process.

q1.question: Which countries do you ship to?
q1.answer: We ship worldwide! We have experience shipping to over 50 countries across Asia, Africa, Europe, Americas, and Oceania. Contact us to confirm shipping options and costs for your specific location.

q2.question: What shipping methods are available?
q2.answer: We offer sea freight (most economical, 20-45 days), air freight (faster, 5-10 days), and express courier services like DHL, FedEx, UPS (fastest, 3-7 days). The best method depends on your urgency, order size, and budget.

q3.question: How can I track my shipment?
q3.answer: Once your order ships, we provide a tracking number for all shipments. You can track your package online, and we'll also send you regular updates on your shipment's progress until it reaches you.

q4.question: Do you handle customs clearance?
q4.answer: We provide all necessary documentation for customs clearance including commercial invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin. While import duties and taxes are the buyer's responsibility, we ensure all paperwork is complete and accurate.

q5.question: Is shipping insurance included?
q5.answer: Shipping insurance is optional but highly recommended. It typically costs 2-3% of the order value and protects your shipment against loss or damage. We can arrange insurance for all shipments upon request.

q1.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept bank wire transfers (T/T), PayPal for smaller orders, Western Union, and MoneyGram. For established customers, we may offer credit terms. Contact us to discuss payment options for your order.

q2.question: What is your return policy?
q2.answer: We accept returns for defective or incorrect parts within 30 days of receipt. Parts must be unused and in original packaging. Contact us immediately if you receive a defective or wrong item, and we'll arrange a replacement or refund.

q3.question: Do you offer warranties?
q3.answer: Yes! New genuine parts come with manufacturer warranties (typically 6-12 months). Aftermarket parts have warranties ranging from 3-6 months depending on the grade. Specific warranty terms are provided with each quotation.

q4.question: What if I receive the wrong part?
q4.answer: If you receive the wrong part due to our error, contact us immediately. We'll arrange for the correct part to be sent at no additional cost and provide a return label for the incorrect item. Your satisfaction is our priority.

q5.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
q5.answer: We strive for 100% customer satisfaction. If you're not satisfied with your purchase for any reason, contact us within 30 days. We'll work with you to find a solution, whether it's a replacement, exchange, or refund for eligible returns.

q1.question: Do you provide installation support?
q1.answer: While we don't provide hands-on installation, we can offer guidance and technical documentation for parts installation. We can also connect you with recommended service centers in your area if needed.

q2.question: Can you help me identify the right part?
q2.answer: Absolutely! Our team has extensive knowledge of automotive parts from China. Send us your vehicle details, photos of the part you need, or the part number, and we'll help identify the exact part you need.

q3.question: Do you provide technical specifications?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide detailed technical specifications for all parts including dimensions, weight, material, compatibility information, and any relevant technical data. This information is included in quotations and product documentation.

q4.question: What if the part doesn't fit my vehicle?
q4.answer: If you ordered based on our recommendation and the part doesn't fit, we'll exchange it for the correct part at no additional cost. This is why we always recommend confirming compatibility before ordering.

q5.question: Can I get help after purchase?
q5.answer: Yes! We provide ongoing support even after your purchase. If you have questions about installation, compatibility, or any issues with the parts, our team is here to help via email, WhatsApp, or phone.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our team is here to help.

qualityGuide.title: Auto Parts Quality Guide
qualityGuide.subtitle: Understanding quality grades to choose the right parts for your needs
qualityGuide.intro: Not all auto parts are created equal. Understanding quality grades helps you make informed decisions and get the best value for your investment.

oem.title: OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer)
oem.description: OEM parts are manufactured by the same company that made the original parts for your vehicle. These are identical to the parts that came with your vehicle from the factory.
pros: Exact fit and specifications as original parts
cons: May require ordering and waiting for delivery
oem.recommended: Critical safety components (brakes, steering), vehicles under warranty, maintaining maximum resale value, fleet vehicles requiring standardization.

original.title: Original/Genuine Parts
original.description: Genuine parts are authentic parts supplied through official brand channels. For Chinese automotive, these are parts bearing official branding and certifications.
cons: Longer lead times for some parts
original.recommended: Vehicles still in service from manufacturer, critical engine and transmission components, maintaining brand standards, commercial fleet operations.

genuine.title: Genuine Quality
genuine.description: High-quality parts that meet or exceed original specifications. These are often manufactured by trusted suppliers to OEM standards.
genuine.recommended: General repairs and maintenance, replacement of worn parts, cost-conscious quality seekers, most commercial applications.

a.title: Grade A (Premium Aftermarket)
a.description: Top-tier aftermarket parts that closely match OEM quality. Manufactured to high standards with quality materials and rigorous testing.
a.recommended: Daily use vehicles, professional operations, quality-focused repairs, parts replacement for older vehicles, cost-effective fleet maintenance.

b.title: Grade B (Standard Aftermarket)
b.description: Good quality aftermarket parts that meet basic specifications. Suitable for standard applications and regular use.
cons: May not last as long as higher grades
b.recommended: Light to moderate use vehicles, non-critical components, budget repairs, older vehicles, parts replacement for resale preparation.

c.title: Grade C (Economy Aftermarket)
c.description: Basic quality aftermarket parts for light use and temporary solutions. Most economical option with acceptable performance for low-demand applications.
pros: Good for vehicles nearing end of life
c.recommended: Temporary repairs, vehicles being sold as-is, very old vehicles with low remaining life, non-critical components, emergency replacements.

aftermarket.title: Aftermarket Parts
aftermarket.description: Third-party manufactured parts designed to fit your vehicle. Quality varies by manufacturer but generally offers good value.
aftermarket.recommended: Non-critical repairs, older vehicles, general maintenance, parts with clear quality ratings, buyers who research manufacturers.

selectionGuide.title: How to Choose the Right Quality Grade
selectionGuide.intro: Consider these factors when selecting parts:

factors.title: Vehicle Age & Value
factors.description: Newer, high-value vehicles benefit most from OEM/Original parts. Older vehicles may be better served by quality aftermarket options.

factors.title: Part Type
factors.description: Critical safety components (brakes, steering, suspension) warrant higher grades. Cosmetic or low-stress parts can use lower grades.

factors.title: Usage Intensity
factors.description: Heavy-duty commercial use requires Grade A or better. Light personal use may be fine with Grade B for non-critical parts.

factors.title: Budget Constraints
factors.description: While higher grades cost more upfront, they often save money long-term through durability and warranty coverage.

factors.title: Warranty Requirements
factors.description: Vehicles under manufacturer warranty typically require OEM parts to maintain coverage.

cta.title: Need Help Choosing the Right Parts?
cta.description: Our experts can help you select the perfect quality grade for your specific needs and budget.
